content.rendered:
Government Organization Army jobs Multan 2024. Application for the position of mess waiter is invited by Government Organization Multan, Multan Punjab Pakistan, according to the advertisement published in the Daily Express newspaper on August 22, 2024. Primary education is preferred.

Applications for government jobs in Army jobs and others can be submitted until 4 October 2024 or as indicated in the newspaper ad. Find out how to apply for the latest job openings in Government Organizations by reading the complete ad online.
The job is at the Pakistan Army department in Multan.

Government Organization Army jobs Multan 2024

Date Posted: 22 August, 2024
Last Date: 04 October, 2024
Sector: Government
Newspaper: Express Jobs
Education: PrimaryVacancy
Location: Multan, Punjab, Pakistan
Industry: Army Jobs
Job Type: Full Time
Job Experience: 2 YearsExpected

Latest Job In August 2024

  • Qatar Jobs 2024 New Brand Manpower Management
  • Latest Private Company Peshawar Classified Jobs August 2024
  • Vacancies at Rising Star International Technical Training Center Abu Dhabi 2024
  • Qatar 2024 Pakistan International School Advertisement
  • Abu Dhabi 2024 Essential Manpower Consultant EMC Management Job

Latest Private Jobs in Multan, Punjab, Pakistan August 2024.
Apply Before the last date of this Job. Government Company Job only for Multan, Punjab, Pakistan Full-time jobs in Multan, Punjab, Pakistan as a Government company This ad shared by Express Jobs
Required Education for this Government company is PrimaryVacancy. Minimum Salary starts from 350000 Rs to 55000 Rs Per Month. For More Information please visit the photo ad & visit the official website of Government Company August 2024.

How to apply?

Apply as per the job advertisement details. Login to view further details of how to apply via https://www.jobz.pk online. Note: Beware of fraudulent recruiting activities. If an employer asks for money, do not pay, and report it to us via the Contact Us form. Follow the instructions & dates in the official job posting. Govt jobs may not be applied online here. Human typing error is possible. Error & omissions excepted.
